website_summaries.verdict: A very good choice if you need a small grill, but it might seem too small at times.
pros: Very efficient grill that has a side burner and is great for small families or gatherings
cons: Two-burner grill feels more than a bit cramped at times

customer_reviews.title: small in size, but packs a big punch
customer_reviews.text: Due to being empty-nesters now, we downsized our gas grill. I was a bit worried bout having enough heat for a good grilling session since we went from a three burner to the two burner. However, I can get temperatures up to 650* with this grill. We use the side burner to fry bacon. The only issue we've had with it was keeping the temperature of the side burner high enough to fry the bacon during a very windy morning. It eventually got the job done, but took much longer than normal. Other times we've used it to fry bacon there have been no problems. You can't go wrong with a Weber.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Get busy grillin' or get busy dyin'
customer_reviews.text: I traded my old propane grill in for the Genesis II. The grilling before was good, but this grill is phenomenal. The control I have over the temperature and the ability to do indirect grilling has changed the way I grill. At first I laughed when they talked about the flavorizer bars enhancing the flavor, but believe me they really do. All of the built in features including the grill light, knob lights and gas measuring system really enhance the grilling experience. I love this grill and plan to use it for years to come, experimenting more now with this remarkable grilling system.
customer_reviews.author: KuliReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Solid construction and good design. The drip tray is inside the grill. It starts automatically and the food cooks evenly, giving the food a great flavor. The side burner also lights easily, and everything cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Great grill and perfect size for a deck !
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill ! Works great and was very easy to connect to my natural gas line. The temperate reaches 400-500 degrees in no time if the lid is closed. Overall, very happy with the grill so far. The side burner works great as well. Very easy to clean and the drop tray works great to collect the fat and oils. Assembly was also a breeze as all the tricky parts were almost pre-assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Bullgod

customer_reviews.title: Nicest appliance I own!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is so beutifully designed. It’s totaly worth the price because almost every part is replaceable and made of stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: pokwang

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to purchase a Webber because they are supposed to be the Cadillac of grills but they fall apart right away. The lights stopped working right away. The wheels also got all bended I think due to the weight of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: MPHG

customer_reviews.title: Love this BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Love this BBQ. It’s perfect for the 2 of us now that the kids are all gone. The delivery was superb. Very polite people that delivered and it came nicely packaged so no damage to anything. Love this grill. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, ended up assembling it myself which was ...
customer_reviews.text: Good unit, ended up assembling it myself which was fairly easy after Amazon's installer couldn't be arranged in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Genesis II is exceptional and robust
customer_reviews.text: Only used the grill a couple times but like its performance so far. The batteries were put in wrong by installer. Remember batter install like flash light.
customer_reviews.author: Don  Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works flawlessly. Assembly was extremely easy with simple, easy to follow instructions provided.
customer_reviews.author: dee dee

customer_reviews.title: Assembly offered but not delivered.
customer_reviews.text: I requested assembly at checkout. The grill arrived today NOT assembled. I'm rather disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall W.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Should last for years.
customer_reviews.text: Has been great addition to back yard..Love to cook on it & really like the use of side burner..High quality & should last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kamper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stainless marks up very easily. A little bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Grilling at its finest!
customer_reviews.text: Love the LX S240! The temperature control is precise and is amazingly fast to achieve 500 degrees to sear the steaks. The flavorizer bars sizzle when meat drippings make contact and I just installed the I grill3 temp probes for knowing exactly when the food is ready to serve. The sideburner is ideal for sauteing onions and mushroom topper. The only negative is the unsightly exposure of the natural gas hose on the side. It seems there could be a shield of some sort. This design flaw is a major oversight however I would buy this grill again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: J.Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill and Weber service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill 2 years ago and so far it has been excellent. It cooks evenly and I like it's features and how easy to clean it is. Recently, I had an issue with the ignitor. I replaced battery and still would not work. I called Weber and with no questions asked, they sent out a replacement ignitor module which I received in 4 days. When I bought the grill, I registered it online making the whole process very easy. I'm very happy with the grill and the service
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

product_meta.title: Weber, Black 60014001 Genesis II LX E-240 Liquid Propane Grill, Two-Burner
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:Liquid PropaneThe GS4 high performance grilling system sets a new standard in the world of backyard cuisine, & Lands the Genesis II LX in a class of its own. This innovative grilling system is based on over 30 years of grilling experience, culinary expertise, & most importantly, avidly considering the wants & needs of the people who matter most – the grilling community. each component of GS4 was uniquely designed for ease-of-use & to provide an unequaled satisfaction to your backyard grilling experience. Promising burners that are ensured to ignite every time, smoke infused food that grills evenly & consistently regardless of where it's placed on the cooking grate, & hassle free cleanup; you are able to focus on what it’s is all about – bringing people together around the grill.the GS4 grilling system is composed of four key components: the Infinity ignition, high performance burners, Flavorizer bars, & grease management system. These components ensure that every aspect of your grilling experience is easy & reliable; from the moment the burners are lit to the general maintenance of your grill. & together, create the strongest grilling engine within this Genesis II LX grill.
feature_bullets: GS4 Grilling System includes two high performance stainless steel burners with stainless steel Flavorizer bars and New Grease Management System reduces risk of dangerous flare-ups and makes grease removal easy. Dimensions - Lid Open (inches) 63"H x 52"W x 33"D.Dimensions - Lid Closed (inches) 48"H x 52"W x 29"D
7mm stainless steel cooking grates provide 380 square inches of cooking space with 114 square inch Tuck-Away warming rack overhead
Infinity Ignition ensures that by turning the knob, the gas will ignite and start each burner with ease, and is backed by a generous warranty
Flush-mounted side burner is perfect for preparing side dishes and sauces
3D interactive assembly instructions for this product are available through the free BILT app.
